
{{$
\displaylines{
P + Q = R                   \quad closure \\
P + Q = Q + P               \quad commutativity \\
(P + Q) + S = P + (Q + S)   \quad associativity \\
P + ∞ = P                   \quad identity \\
P + O = P                   \quad identity \\
P + (-P) = ∞                \quad symmetry \\
}
}}$
